scripts.dev: sh -c 'if [ -f ./.env ]; then set -a && . ./.env && set +a; fi && VITE_POSTS_REPO_DIR=dummy-posts vite'
scripts.build: npm run fetch-posts && npm run build:vite && npm run generate-ogp && npm run inject-ogp && npm run copy-images && npm run generate-wrangler-config
scripts.build:local: npm run fetch-posts:ssh && npm run build:vite && npm run generate-ogp && npm run inject-ogp && npm run copy-images && npm run generate-wrangler-config
scripts.fetch-posts: sh -c 'if [ -f ./.env ]; then set -a && . ./.env && set +a; fi && rm -rf "$VITE_POSTS_REPO_DIR" && if [ -n "$GH_TOKEN" ]; then git clone --depth 1 "${VITE_POSTS_REPO_URL/https:\/\/github.com\//https://${GH_TOKEN}@github.com/}" "$VITE_POSTS_REPO_DIR"; else git clone --depth 1 "$VITE_POSTS_REPO_URL" "$VITE_POSTS_REPO_DIR"; fi'
scripts.fetch-posts:ssh: sh -c 'if [ -f ./.env ]; then set -a && . ./.env && set +a; fi && rm -rf "$VITE_POSTS_REPO_DIR" && git clone --depth 1 "$VITE_POSTS_REPO_URL" "$VITE_POSTS_REPO_DIR" --config url."git@github.com:".insteadOf="https://github.com/"'
scripts.build:vite: sh -c 'if [ -f ./.env ]; then set -a && . ./.env && set +a; fi && vite build --mode client && vite build'
scripts.generate-ogp: sh -c 'if [ -f ./.env ]; then set -a && . ./.env && set +a; fi && npx tsx scripts/generate-ogp.ts'
scripts.inject-ogp: sh -c 'if [ -f ./.env ]; then set -a && . ./.env && set +a; fi && npx tsx scripts/inject-ogp.ts'
scripts.copy-images: sh -c 'if [ -f ./.env ]; then set -a && . ./.env && set +a; fi && cp -r "$VITE_POSTS_REPO_DIR/images" dist/ 2>/dev/null || true'
scripts.generate-wrangler-config: sh -c 'if [ -f ./.env ]; then set -a && . ./.env && set +a; fi && sed "s/ACCOUNT_ID_PLACEHOLDER/$CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID/; s/HYPERDRIVE_ID_PLACEHOLDER/$HYPERDRIVE_ID/; s/ROUTES_PATTERN_PLACEHOLDER/$ROUTES_PATTERN/; s/ROUTES_ZONE_PLACEHOLDER/$ROUTES_ZONE/" wrangler.template.toml > wrangler.toml'
scripts.preview: sh -c 'if [ -f ./.env ]; then set -a && . ./.env && set +a; fi && CLOUDFLARE_HYPERDRIVE_LOCAL_CONNECTION_STRING_HYPERDRIVE="$VITE_DB_CONNECTION_STRING" wrangler dev'
